Bank CIMB Niaga Tawarkan Promo Bunga KPR 2,4 Persen Fix Setahun
07 Nov 2019, 09:51 by Bisnis.com, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk. menawarkan promo suku bunga kredit pemilikan rumah (KPR) sebesar 2,4 persen fix selama satu tahun untuk menarik nasabah. Untuk program ini, bank berkode saham BNGA itu juga telah bekerja sama dengan sejumlah pengembang perumahan dalam program KPR Xtra Spesial.
Direktur Konsumer Banking CIMB Niaga Lani Darmawan, manajemen menerapkan strategi cross selling dengan menawarkan KPR kepada nasabah eksisting. ”Untuk menggenjot pertumbuhan KPR, kami juga menghadirkan beragam program promo yang menguntungkan," ujarnya seperti dikutip dalam keterangan pers, Kamis, 7 November 2019.
Lani menjelaskan, salah satu program promo teranyar Bank CIMB Niaga adalah kolaborasi dengan pengembang rekanan menawarkan program KPR Xtra Spesial dengan suku bunga mulai dari 2,4 persen. "Fix pada tahun pertama dan harga spesial untuk biaya-biaya kredit,” katanya.
Penawaran ini berlaku hingga 31 Desember 2019 untuk pembelian rumah atau apartemen baru dengan developer terpilih mitra CIMB Niaga yang tersebar di sejumlah kota. Beberapa pengembang yang menjadi mitra CIMB Niaga diantaranya Suvarna Sutera, Alam Sutera, Branz BSD, Damai Putra Group (Kota Harapan Indah, Segara City, dan The Royal Residence).
Selain itu pengembang yang juga menjadi mitra CIMB Niaga adalah Duta Putra Land Group (Bukit Golf Riverside), Sinarmas Land Group (Nava Park, BSD City, Banjar Wijaya, Grand Wisata, Kota Wisata, dan Legenda Wisata), Kota Baru Parahyangan di Bandung, dan Jaya Metro (Bukit Kencana Jaya dan Pandanaran Hills di Semarang).
Promo tersebut juga berlaku di berbagai proyek di bawah Ciputra Group seperti Citraland Manado, Barsa City, CitraLand Cibubur, Citra Harmoni, CitraGrand Cibubur CBD, Citra Indah, CitraGran, CitraGarden Sidoarjo, CitraLand Lampung, CitraLand Cirebon, CitraGrand Galesong City, CitraGrand Semarang, dan CitraSun Garden Semarang.
”Kami berharap Program KPR Xtra Spesial ini disambut positif oleh pasar, sehingga kami dapat mempertahankan pertumbuhan KPR double digit hingga akhir tahun,” kata Lani.
Hingga akhir tahun CIMB Niaga menargetkan penyaluran KPR mampu tumbuh 10-12 persen. Adapun total nilai KPR yang disalurkan perseroan hingga akhir September 2019 mencapai Rp 32,82 triliun. Angka tersebut tercatat tumbuh 12,6 persen apabila dibandingkan dengan periode yang sama tahun lalu.
Lani menyebutkan pertumbuhan penyaluran KPR ini sejalan dengan target perseroan hingga akhir tahun. “Kami akan terus menghadirkan customer experience yang baik seperti pengajuan dan proses KPR yang mudah dan bisa dilakukan secara online serta melalui video banking di Digital Lounge,” ucapnya.

Bank CIMB Niaga Offers a 2.4 Percent Fix Mortgage Interest Promo a Year
Nov 7 2019, 09:51 by Bisnis.com, Rr. Ariyani Yakti Widyastuti
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - PT Bank CIMB Niaga Tbk. offers a home loan (KPR) interest rate promo of 2.4 percent fixed for one year to attract customers. For this program, the bank coded BNGA shares have also worked with a number of housing developers in the Special Xtra KPR program.
CIMB Niaga Consumer Banking Director Lani Darmawan, management implemented a cross selling strategy by offering mortgages to existing customers. "To boost the growth of mortgages, we also present a variety of profitable promotional programs," he said as quoted in a press statement, Thursday, November 7, 2019.
Lani explained, one of Bank CIMB Niaga's latest promo programs is collaboration with partner developers offering the Special Xtra KPR program with interest rates starting at 2.4 percent. "Fix in the first year and special prices for credit costs," he said.
This offer is valid until 31 December 2019 for the purchase of a new house or apartment with selected developers CIMB Niaga partners spread across a number of cities. Some developers who are partners of CIMB Niaga include Suvarna Sutera, Alam Sutera, BSD Branz, Damai Putra Group (Kota Harapan Indah, Segara City, and The Royal Residence).
In addition, developers who are also partners of CIMB Niaga are Duta Putra Land Group (Bukit Golf Riverside), Sinarmas Land Group (Nava Park, BSD City, Banjar Wijaya, Grand Wisata, City Tourism, and Legend of Tourism), Kota Baru Parahyangan in Bandung, and Jaya Metro (Bukit Kencana Jaya and Pandanaran Hills in Semarang).
The promotion also applies to various projects under Ciputra Group such as Citraland Manado, Barsa City, CitraLand Cibubur, Citra Harmoni, CitraGrand Cibubur CBD, Citra Indah, CitraGran, CitraGarden Sidoarjo, CitraLand Lampung, CitraLand Cirebon, CitraGrand Galesong City, CitraGrand Semarang, and CitraSun Garden Semarang.
"We hope that the Xtra Special KPR Program will be welcomed positively by the market, so that we can maintain double digit mortgage growth until the end of the year," Lani said.
Until the end of the year CIMB Niaga targets KPR distribution to grow by 10-12 percent. The total value of KPR distributed by the company until the end of September 2019 reached Rp 32.82 trillion. This figure is recorded to grow 12.6 percent when compared with the same period last year.
Lani said the growth in KPR distribution was in line with the company's target until the end of the year. "We will continue to present a good customer experience such as the easy and easy mortgage application and submission process that can be done online and through video banking in Digital Lounge," he said.
